page.title: 04Markyate Village School
page.content: {MARKYATE J.M.I.SCHOOL Our school is Markyate J.M.I. school. The school day begins at 8.55am till 3.30pm with a dinner break from 12 noon to 1.20pm and 2 shorter breaks.The Infants start at 8.55 too but finish at 3.25pm with a dinner break at 12.00 till 1.30pm and 2 shorter breaks. The Infants have 3 classes and so do the Juniors. After school there are various clubs such as Rounders, Book Club, Board Games Club, Football Club and a Computer Club. Every year the older children go on a school trip, often to Wales. We are going to Tenby this year. At the age of 11 pupils leave this school to go to a school in Hemel Hempstead or St.Albans. We have to travel to Secondary School by coach so it makes the day longer.
